text: Add the chicken to a large saucepan. Fill the pan about an inch with water and season it with salt. Place it over a high heat until boiling. Simmer the chicken for about 10 minutes or until cooked thoroughly. Remove from heat and let it cool with the liquids for 30 minutes. Toast the curry powder, for about a minute, in another saucepan over a very low heat. Stir constantly to avoid burning the powder. Create the salad dressing. Combine the toasted curry powder, yogurt, mayonnaise, chutney, pepper, lime juice, and salt. Drain the chicken and cut into small, bite-size pieces.  Add the chicken, celery, mango, and cilantro to the dressing. Fold ingredients to combine thoroughly. Arrange the lettuce leaves on the bottom of a platter. Carefully add the chicken salad on top of the lettuce and sprinkle the almonds on top. Finished.
